info.name: FiMFiction.net - Recolor Chapter Notes & Footer
info.description: A Stylish port of FIMFiction Story Page CleanUp by Selbi. This style lets you set a custom color scheme for the author's note box and page footer on FiMFiction.net story chapter pages.
info.additionalInfo:
• I don't actively use this myself so please notify me immediately if something breaks.
  • I'm assuming that this is meant to be used together with some other recoloring tweak. I'm receptive to combining them into a single script if the target aesthetic can be clearly explained.
